original_title: Georgia teen accused of killing parents denied bond in alleged murder case | Fox News
article_summary: Georgia teen Sarah Grace Patrick, accused of murdering her mother and stepfather, was denied bond after an emotional hearing. Patrick, who had raised awareness about the case on TikTok, is charged as an adult with two counts of murder and two counts of aggravated assault. The judge cited potential flight risk and witness intimidation as reasons for the denial.</s>
